name: Bobby Banis
text: I tried to call and order but they wouldn’t answer the phone. I went in to order and it was immediately obvious that there was no interest in serving customers. There were no other customers and the lady said it would be at least a half an hour wait. Employees are just to lazy to serve customers, why even be open? Never again!

name: sheila shaw
text:
Food is always good when you can order.
Half the time they wont take orders due to no staff. Take the phone off the hook zo you can phone orders in .

name: Sean Bayl
text: Delicious pizza! Perfect crust, perfect cheese amount(alot), perfect topping amount! This pizza beats any restaurant around!

name: Patty Bostic
text: Absolutely love this pizza with a great taste and unique crust.

name: Cindy Dotson
text: Drove 30 - 40 minutes,,, because we like godfather's,, the woman who waited on us was so RUDE!!!! They didn't have any crust but personal size,,we asked her the size and she made a size with her hands and said "about this before big" really …More

name: Neo Shadow17
text: This is the best pizza place ever, me and my mother love to go there. The pizza is always perfect when we get it and the employees are very nice. The cashier that served us today even apologised for the 25 minute wait, which is not a very …More

name: Adam Powell
text: Friendly staff and tasty food

name: Samuel Mount
text: Pizzas were great...they certainly didn't skimp on the cheese. Service from staff wish quick, efficient, and fairly friendly. Cooking and deliver to counter was very slow-20 minutes plus. That's why I deducted 1 star.

name: Molly Jones
text: Their pizza is always good..sometimes they miss extra ingredients, but still sooooo good!

name: kimberly smeigh
text: Pizza was hot and great but breadsticks were hard

name: Margaret Smith
text: Good Pizza!  Good Service!

name: Matthew Roman
text: I had a pizza that was very under done. I called and offered to bring it back for a refund but the manager offered to replace it. The second pizzas I got appeared burnt on top but was actually very good. I assume theyou are having oven …More

name: Buffie Rea-ROGERS
text: Really good pizza once in a while we call and order a pizza and just enjoy the drive to pick it up on the weekend cause it's off 70. But worth it good price to.

name: Kain's Able
text: Not the worst pizza but I wouldn't recommend buying unless it's your only option.

name: Blake Bryant
text: Great pizza, great service!

name: June December
text: In my opinion Godfathers pizza is the best I've had. Always good regardless of location.  This particular place is fantastic
